column2: LendingTree, Inc. engages in the operation of online loan marketplace for consumers seeking loans and other credit-based offerings. The company is headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina and currently employs 892 full-time employees. The firm's online marketplace provides consumers with access to product offerings from various lenders, which it refers to as Network Lenders, including mortgage loans, home equity loans and lines of credit, reverse mortgage loans, auto loans, credit cards, personal loans, student loans, small business loans and other related offerings. In addition, the Company offers tools and resources, including free credit scores that facilitate comparison shopping for these loans and other credit-based offerings. The firm offers its products in categories, including mortgage products and non-mortgage products. Its mortgage products category includes its purchase and refinance products. Its non-mortgage products include lending products and other products.
